title: Cure!

meta.alt_txt: remove most negative status effects from {userplayer} and grant immunity for the rest of the round
meta.double_alt_txt: remove most negative effects off of yourself and gain Immunity {!e card_get_meta_num {fusion} cu_amt} immediately

desc:
[cu]

Remove most negative status effects off of yourself and make yourself immune to them for the rest of the round.

-# Excludes Disease, but bypasses Incapacitated.
